charges.charge_description: 18:922(a)(6) and 924(a) PENALTIES FOR FIREARMS-False statement in connection with firearm purchase (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant committed to custody Bureau of Prisons for 41 months as to each count to be served concurrently. Court recommends defendant be designated to FCI, Estill, SC, for service of his period of incarceration. Upon release from imprisonment, defendant shall be on supervised release for 3 years with the special conditions: (1) Defendant shall pay a special assessment of $200 within 120 days of his release from incarceration; (2) defendant shall participate in program of testing and treatment for drug and alcohol abuse as directed until such time as defendant is released from the program by the U. S. probation Officer; (3) defendant shall participate in program of mental health treatment as directed by the probation office until such time as defendant is released from the program by the probation officer; and (4) defendant shall engage in a continuing education program to obtain a high school diploma or its equivalent. (1s)
